## Abstract

Modern Art UI provides a graphical interface for an Android App that is a dedicated link to MOMA.org.  The purpose of the project is demonstrating UI control.  There are 1,133 files in 408 folders within the main project directory.  This file lists the more important files.

## Critcal Files

* **MainActivity.java**  This file is the activity that draws the opening screen of the Android app **Modern Art UI**

* **BrowserActivity.java** This file is the activity that opens the web browser to MOMA.org

### Critical Drawables

* **rect0i.xml**, where i is an index from 1-5, define the 5 rectangles that comprise the opening screen.

### Useful External Resource

* [Android Holo Colors Generator](http://android-holo-colors.com/) is a website that generates drawable resources consistent with the developers color branding
